job_desc: We are looking for an Analyst with 0 2 years of working experience and demonstrable affinity with analytics in a business consulting environment to join our Data Science and Business Analytics team  What we offer Interact with our clients on regular basis to drive their business towards impactful change Utilize data analytics to solve real life problems and create new business solutions using insights you create Work in multidisciplinary teams and learn from motivated colleagues A chance to take responsibility for your work  develop yourself every day  and take full ownership of your career Become part of a fast growing international and diverse team What you will do Are responsible for everything related to data  using data science and analytics to solve business problems and work together with the client to utilize their data to the fullest Bridge the gap between business and data  applying your knowledge of data science to translate business problems to analytics solutions Develop both your technical skills as a data scientist and consultancy skills as a business consultant Work closely together in small teams with colleagues from diverse personal and professional backgrounds Feel the impact of your work by not only creating a solution but also driving the execution of your solution Get the chance to seek compelling opportunities beyond the scope of your current project What you ll bring Master  or Ph D   degree in a quantitative field with a focus on data analysis  e g  econometrics  AI  Mathematics  physics  and other exact sciences  Sharp thinking ability to be able to quickly differentiate major contributors from irrelevant details and to hierarchically structure information residing in the data under analysis The drive to become an expert in whatever business problem might cross your path Robust knowledge of statistical concepts  accompanied by expertise with a set of analytical tools ranging from databases  e g  SQL  BigQuery  noSQL  to programming languages  e g  R  Python   and from data visualization  e g  Tableau  PowerBI  to machine learning  Understanding data engineering solutions is a plus Demonstrable affinity with analytics in a business consulting environment or relevant industry experience Excellent communication skills  especially to explain complex analytical concepts in non technical terms to business users Collaborative and entrepreneurial mindset along with a structured and goal oriented approach when facing new challenges Professional fluency in Dutch and English

skills: azure, sql, tableau, python, rest, saas
job_desc: Would you like to put your data analytics experience to use in an independent and responsible role at a fast growing tech scale up ChannelEngine is looking for an enthusiastic Data Analyst to work alongside our business and technical teams to create business value through data  We re working on some cool projects and need more talented people in the team to make our company goals a reality  We re building a data platform  migrating to Azure  and working on machine learning models  You ll be involved in all of this  as well as the day to day of helping convert all the useful e commerce data we have in our platform into digestible business intelligence to provide our stakeholders with the right insights to aid their decision making  What else will you be doing  Using business insight and technical knowledge to define  develop and deliver analytics solutions for stakeholders Liaising with external clients who request data or reporting solutions Communicating with business stakeholders to understand key metrics  analyse business and technical requirements then develop reporting   data applications Developing and maintaining ETL   ELT pipelines and data components to extend and optimise the ChannelEngine data platform Developing rich  intuitive automated dashboards Developing ad hoc reports and providing analytics services to support business decision making processes Searching and applying tools and or methodologies to foster data analytics best practices Documenting relevant code  business requirements and technical processes Providing support to the development of training materials and training activities related to the BI tools and applications Debugging issues  discrepancies and finding root causes  What you ll need Bachelor s degree in Maths  Data Science  or a similar field Minimum 4  years  experience as a developer or analyst within an analytics teams Minimum 2  years  experience in data modelling and SQL Ability to understand and analyse business processes and requirements Experience in dashboard development using PowerBI  Tableau  Looker or a similar tool Excellent communication skills in English  both written and verbal Active listening skills and a proactive approach Willingness to learn new things Availability to work 32 40 hours per week Eligibility to work in the Netherlands without visa sponsorship  Nice to have Microsoft Azure and Google Cloud Platform experience Some Python skills  What can we offer you  Number 1  working at a company that is at the forefront of the world of e commerce and online marketplaces An interesting industry  marketplaces are booming  therefore our company is thriving This is a new role  You will have the opportunity and resources to implement your bright ideas together with the rest of the team We are in the process of building a data platform which brings plenty of interesting challenges   no two days are the same We have plenty of data and lots of demand to consume it State of the art tech  we work with the latest technologies  business models and tools  We re currently migrating to Azure Personal and professional development within a fast growing company with international plans and ambitions Work in our modern office next to Leiden Central Station  with views across the city or  of course  from home We want our colleagues to be happy and healthy  so there are quality chairs and sit stand desks to work at  as well as other ergonomic tools at your disposal Free healthy  and slightly less healthy  snacks  the widest selection of tea you ve ever seen  and exceptionally good coffee to keep you well fuelled throughout the day A very social and passionate team  We have lunch with colleagues  and we like to do fun activities together  About ChannelEngine ChannelEngine is a fast growing  e commerce SaaS solution  We help brands  retailers and wholesalers find millions of new customers by connecting them to the biggest marketplaces around the world Our story began in 2013 when it became undeniable that marketplaces were going to be one of the most critical components of the global e commerce industry  We saw an opportunity to make these powerful platforms available to every business  and now ChannelEngine offers a complete  user friendly  marketplace management suite with seamless integration  enabling businesses to expand their reach internationally  Our clients include Bugaboo  Hunkemöller  Brabantia  Bosch  JDE  and Reckitt  to name just a few ChannelEngine is growing at a rapid pace and currently covers channels in Europe  North  and Central America  the Middle East  and Asia Pacific  Our mission is to cover the globe  For this  we need to expand our teams with adventurous and ambitious people who want to shape the world of e commerce with us Are you up for the challenge  Don t hesitate to send us your application today Job Type  Full time

job_title: Inspecteur Geestelijke Gezondheidszorg met data affiniteit
job_desc: Inspecteur Geestelijke Gezondheidszorg met data affiniteit Inspectie Gezondheidszorg en Jeugd Functieomschrijving Wil jij bijdragen aan goede en veilige zorg en jeugdhulp  Kom werken bij de Inspectie Gezondheidszorg en Jeugd  Wij handelen vanuit het publieke belang en zijn duidelijk  onafhankelijk en eerlijk  Vanwege de nieuwe Wet toetreding zorgaanbieders  Wtza  gaan wij meer en actiever toezicht houden op nieuwe zorgaanbieders  Voor de afdeling Geestelijke Gezondheidszorg  GGZ  zijn wij op zoek naar een Inspecteur voor 32 uur per week  De wet toetreding zorgaanbieders houdt in dat alle nieuwe aanbieders van zorg een meldplicht hebben  Het primaire doel hiervan is een effectiever risicotoezicht  Het tweede doel van de meldplicht is dat de nieuwe zorgaanbieder vooraf precies weet aan welke eisen zijn zorg moet voldoen  zoals aangegeven in de Wet kwaliteit  klachten en geschillen zorg  Wkkgz   Met het oog op onze publieke taak vinden wij het belangrijk om goed aansluiting te vinden bij verschillende doelgroepen in de maatschappij  Bij de Inspectie hechten wij waarde aan openheid en gelijkheid  Iedereen kan en mag zichzelf zijn  Wij werken in divers samengestelde teams  Dat maakt het werk leuker  innovatiever en effectiever  Wil jij daar deel van uitmaken en meewerken aan de voortdurende verbetering van de maatschappelijke zorg en jeugdhulp in Nederland  Dan willen wij heel graag met je kennismaken  Onze organisatie zit in een ontwikkelfase die volop de ruimte biedt voor nieuwe ideeën en creativiteit om te werken aan relevante maatschappelijke vraagstukken  die een integrale aanpak vragen van onze toezicht afdelingen  Wat ga je doen  Als inspecteur houd je toezicht op de kwaliteit van de Geestelijke Gezondheidszorg in Nederland en werk je nauw samen met andere medewerkers aan de IGJ brede opgave om het toezicht op nieuwe zorgaanbieders intensiever aan te pakken  In de ontwikkeling van het toezicht op nieuwe zorgaanbieders zetten we in op digitalisering en actief gebruik van data  Hieraan lever je een bijdrage  Toezicht houden op nieuwe zorgaanbieders is je belangrijkste taak  Daarvoor leg je inspectiebezoeken af bij  nieuwe  zorgaanbieders waarover je rapporteert  Daarnaast verricht je projectmatige werkzaamheden in de doorontwikkeling van het toezicht op nieuwe zorgaanbieders en andere algemene toezichtstaken  Daarbij vragen we veel data op  Zo kunnen we sneller zien waar zich risico s voor kunnen doen en wat nieuwe ontwikkelingen zijn  Je analyseert de verzamelde informatie en legt dat vast in heldere rapportages  Deze rapportages vormen de basis voor het risicogestuurde toezicht op nieuwe zorgaanbieders  Bij het onderzoek staat centraal  leren van incidenten  eventuele tekortkomingen vaststellen en maatregelen nemen om herhaling te voorkomen  Waar nodig initieer of ondersteun je bij een handhavingstraject  Daarnaast denk je na over relevantie van gebruik van data en bekijk je samen met je collega s welke analyses van toegevoegde waarde zijn  Je werkt vanuit de afdeling GGZ  maar zo nodig ben je ook flexibel en breed inzetbaar binnen de hele IGJ  Functie eisen Wie ben jij  Bij IGJ zoeken we nieuwe collega s met brede kennis  kunde en interesse  Je hebt een afgeronde Hbo opleiding en bij voorkeur kennis en relevante werkervaring op het werkveld van de GGZ  Je hebt interesse in en enige ervaring met digitale informatie analyse  Je hebt een open kijk op de zorg en zin om met passie en drive te gaan werken aan het doel van de IGJ  behoud en verbetering van de goede Nederlandse zorg  en hulpverlening  Daarbij bekijk je vraagstukken graag vanuit verschillende perspectieven en vind je aansluiting bij verschillende doelgroepen in de maatschappij  Als Inspecteur ben je in staat om zorgvuldig te werken en kun je goed samenwerken  Daarnaast ben je transparant en kun je objectief zijn in de afwegingen die je maakt en de oordelen die je vormt  Deze weet jij vast te leggen in heldere rapporten en adviezen  Daarbij weet jij te handelen naar ons motto  duidelijk  onafhankelijk en eerlijk  Je bent nieuwsgierig naar de laatste ontwikkelingen in de zorg en staat er voor open om mee te denken en actief mee te bewegen om ons toezicht en onze interne werkprocessen beter  slimmer en efficiënter in te vullen  Daarbij hoort dat je flexibel en breed inzetbaar bent en kunt werken in divers samengestelde teams en projectgroepen  Dat vind je ook leuk en gaat jou gemakkelijk af  Competenties Oordeelsvorming  organisatiesensitiviteit  overtuigingskracht  stressbestendigheid  plannen en organiseren  accuraat werken en zelfontwikkeling  Arbeidsvoorwaarden Salarisniveau  schaal 10 Salarisomschrijving  Het salaris voor een Inspecteur bedraagt maximaal   4 519   bruto per maand  schaal 10  CAO Rijk   op basis van 36 uur per week  Maandsalaris  Min  2 811   Max   4 519  bruto  Dienstverband  Arbeidsovereenkomst voor bepaalde tijd met uitzicht op onbepaalde tijd Contractduur  Je krijgt een tijdelijke arbeidsovereenkomst van 1 jaar met uitzicht op een vast dienstverband Minimaal aantal uren per week  32 Maximaal aantal uren per week  32 Overige arbeidsvoorwaarden Naast je salaris bieden wij je verschillende secundaire arbeidsvoorwaarden  De mogelijkheid om extra vakantiedagen op te bouwen  Een IKB budget  dit bedraagt 16 37  van het jaarsalaris  In dit budget zijn de vakantie  en eindejaarsuitkering opgenomen  Iedere maand bouw je een deel van het IKB budget op  Dit opgebouwde budget kun je gebruiken voor o a  deelname aan fitness  Een pensioenregeling bij het ABP  Een volledige vergoeding woon werkverkeer met het OV  2e klasse   De mogelijkheden voor opleidingen  trainingen en coaching  166 vakantie uren bij een fulltime aanstelling  144 wettelijke vakantie uren en 22 IKB uren   60  betaald ouderschapsverlof  Een laptop en smartphone  Een mooie flexibele werkplek in het Stadskantoor Utrecht naast het Centraal Station  Bijzonderheden De eerste ronde selectiegesprekken worden gehouden op maandag 21 maart 2022  De tweede ronde staat gepland op maandag 4 april 2022  Omdat je in deze functie met vertrouwelijke informatie werkt  vragen we tijdens de sollicitatieprocedure om referenties en heb je om in dienst te treden een Verklaring Omtrent het Gedrag nodig  Kijk op www functiegebouwrijksoverheid nl voor het volledige functieprofiel inclusief de bijbehorende competenties van Inspecteur  Wij vinden het belangrijk dat binnen de IGJ jouw kennis en expertise breed gedeeld wordt  Vanzelfsprekend ga je als inspecteur werken voor een specifieke afdeling  Echter  waar nodig wordt er IGJ breed een beroep gedaan op jouw kennis  De Inspectie Gezondheidszorg en Jeugd omarmt diversiteit  We hebben behoefte aan een diversiteit aan perspectieven  achtergronden  talenten en kennis  Zo zijn we op ons best en blijven we leren en verbeteren  Niet ondanks  maar dankzij verschillen  Solliciteren  Inspectie Gezondheidszorg en Jeugd nodigt je uit op hun site te solliciteren  Via onderstaande knop verlaat je deze site ga je direct naar het sollicitatieformulier  Het Rijk hecht waarde aan een diverse en inclusieve organisatie  Werken in divers samengestelde teams maakt ons effectiever  innovatiever en het werk leuker  Eenieder wordt daarom uitgenodigd te solliciteren

Imagine  that we transform large datasets into information in no time  which results in reliable and timely reporting for internal steering and regulators  You can contribute to this as a Data Driven improvement of the processes  You maintain contact with stakeholders and participate in projects  You are able to solve complex issues by connecting people  data  regulation and internal policies  With each other Collaboration is at the heart of everything we do  Our Capital   Credit team brings talented people together to deliver financial information for the regulatory and internal reporting of the bank  With you as a Data Data Driven Analyst  the team will consist of 22 diverse colleagues in a variety of roles  including  Nadia Seevathian  Reporting Analyst   Perfect combination of my experience with CRR 2  CRD  I V or comparable regulations  interest in data  excellent communication skills  Growing a better world together You ll already be aware that Rabobank is a financial industry experience  with at least 3  years at a project lead level  What we offer Interact with our clients on regular basis to drive their business towards impactful change Lead your team in creating new business solutions via data driven insights Seize opportunities at the client and at Metyis in our entrepreneurial environment Become part of a fast growing international and diverse team What you will do Are responsible for managing client interactions and play a key role in building and maintaining client relationships Translate business problems to analytics solutions with clear output  Translate analytical output to drive business decisions that create impact Provide project management oversight required to meet client expectations Responsibilities may include overall project delivery quality  development of presentations  and managing of external relationships Function as a sounding board for data and analytics related questions of client business leadership Seek compelling opportunities beyond the scope of the current project Provide guidance to more junior members of the team  while orchestrating the work of the entire team  Drive growth and development for the members of the team What you ll bring Master  or Ph D   degree in a quantitative field with a focus on data analysis  e g  econometrics  AI  mathematics  statistics  physics  and other exact sciences  Mastery of problem solving and solution in R Robust knowledge of statistical concepts  accompanied by expertise with a set of analytical tools ranging from databases  e g  SQL  BigQuery  NoSQL  to programming languages  e g  R  Python   and from data visualization  e g  Tableau  PowerBI  to machine learning  Understanding data engineering solutions is a plus  Proven ability to own the full responsibility of overall delivery  manage projects with expert team members  and provide inspiring guidance to the team 7  years of consulting experience or relevant industry experience  with at least 3  years at a project lead level Excellent communication skills  especially to explain complex analytical concepts in non technical terms to business users  Professional fluency in Dutch and English

hbo Ben jij sterk in conclusies en verbanden trekken uit een grote hoeveelheid data  Beschik je over cijfermatig en analytisch inzicht  En heb je affiniteit met logistiek  Dan zijn wij op zoek naar jou  KLG Europe is een internationaal logistiek dienstverlener  We zijn een actieve en grote speler in de logistiek en bedienen wereldwijd klanten uit verschillende branches  Jaarlijks groeien we enorm en we hebben de doelstelling om deze groeicurve te behouden  Om dit te realiseren zijn we ter uitbreiding van onze Supply Chain afdeling op zoek naar een Data Analist  De Supply Chain afdeling heeft onder andere als taak het analyseren van data t b v  procesverbetering en het uitwerken van grote logistieke aanvragen  tenders   Wat ga je doen  Je gaat jezelf verdiepen in zowel interne als externe data om hieruit analyses en rapportages op te stellen en KPI s  Key Performance Indicators  te meten  De uitkomsten van deze analyses en rapportages vormen de basis voor verbetering van onze interne processen evenals ons serviceniveau richting klanten  Je weet al deze informatie dan ook prima te communiceren in begrijpelijke taal  Daarnaast assisteer je ons tenderteam met het analyseren en opstellen van aanbiedingen voor grote klanten  Je start hierbij met een verdieping in de eisen van de klant en analyseert alle aangeleverde data in Excel  Vervolgens ga je in overleg met de Operations en Sales afdeling  om de mogelijkheden te onderzoeken die KLG kan bieden  Met deze informatie maak je calculaties en kom je tot een totaal concept  Je taken zijn met name  Analyseren van data afkomstig uit het Warehouse   Transport Management Systeem ten behoeve van het opstellen van simulaties en nacalculaties  Het opstellen van interne   en externe rapportages  Zorgdragen voor juiste communicatie  afstemming en informatieoverdracht naar andere afdelingen  Signaleren van verbeterpunten en deze samen met het team optimaliseren  Het uitwerken van tenders  calculeren en uitwerken van logistieke aanvragen   Proactief bewaken van je werkzaamheden en opstellen van eigen planning  Meedenken en inbreng geven tijdens periodiek te houden overleg  Dit biedt KLG Europe Een deskundig team  waarmee je samen het resultaat bereikt en met plezier kunt terugkijken op je werkdag en je afgeronde planning  Werken bij een groeiende en kerngezonde logistieke dienstverlener waar Simon Loos is door het ondernemersplatform MT  Sprout uitgeroepen tot beste logistieke dienstverlener 2021 in de categorie goederenvervoer  Om ook in 2022 deze titel in de wacht te kunnen slepen heeft Simon Loos grote ambities  Om deze waar te kunnen maken zijn wij op zoek naar een gedreven Data Analist  Het belang van data analyse vormt namelijk een steeds groter component in de aansturing van logistieke processen  Simon Loos is daar niet anders in  business intelligence  data analyse en bedrijfskundige adviezen vormen binnen onze organisatie een belangrijke pilaar in onze dagelijkse beslissingen  Binnen de Simon Loos familie houd jij je bezig met analyses in de breedste zin des woords met betrekking tot alle bedrijfs    logistieke processen  Concreet betekent dit dat een groot gedeelte van jouw werktijd gevuld is met het analyseren van de cijfers  deze cijfers vertalen inzichten  het weergeven van deze inzichten in duidelijke dashboards en het aanreiken van oplossingen voor de business  Een praktisch voorbeeld van het resultaat van jouw analyses is de aanpassing van de routes van de chauffeurs op basis van rittendata van klanten en wagens  Je dagelijkse werkzaamheden zien er in hoofdlijnen als volgt uit  Je maakt vooruitstrevende analyses en bouwt heldere rapporten Je draagt bij de organisatie naar een data driven organisatie te worden wat helpt bij het realiseren van de bedrijfsdoelstellingen Op basis van bestaande data ontwikkel je visuele dashboards om de collega s te voorzien van inzichten en concrete oplossingen Zoeken we jou   Werken bij Simon Loos betekend een omgeving die houdt van nuchter en praktisch handelen en schakelen  Geen woorden  maar daden  Daarom vinden we jouw mentaliteit en houding misschien nog wel belangrijker dan je ervaringen  Om helemaal bij ons op je plek te zijn als data analist heb je wat ons betreft in ieder geval het volgende in huis  Een afgeronde HBO opleiding in bijvoorbeeld bedrijfskunde  Econometrie of een logistieke of business intelligence richting  Toepasbare kennis van statistiek  Ervaring met planningspakketten en BI tools  Het talent om de wirwar van informatie begrijpelijk te rangschikken en analyseren Het lef om verantwoordelijkheid te nemen Wat mag je van ons verwachten Je krijgt een brede  zelfstandige functie met veel leuke uitdagingen binnen een hecht team en een solide bedrijf  De sfeer binnen Simon Loos is prettig en informeel  en je krijgt alle ruimte om het beste van jezelf te laten zien  Natuurlijk zijn de arbeidsvoorwaarden goed en marktconform  Je standplaats betreft in eerste instantie Middenmeer  na 6 maanden wordt dit Wognum  en bent  als dat nodig is  ook te vinden op één van de andere locaties van Simon Loos  bij onze leveranciers of bij één van onze klanten  Over Simon Loos  Simon Loos is een organisatie van ruim 3 000 medewerkers en 1 400 voertuigen  verdeeld over meer dan 60 standplaatsen door heel Nederland  Wij zijn hartstikke trots op al onze collega s die   dag in dag uit   onze mooie naam in de logistiek waar maken  Als familiebedrijf vinden wij  of je nu onderweg bent of op de plaats van bestemming  persoonlijk contact en collegialiteit belangrijk  Kom jij ook werken bij het leukste familiebedrijf van Nederland  Alle basisvoorwaarden zijn uitstekend geregeld en je salaris is altijd op tijd  Je komt daarnaast te werken bij een fijne  professionele werkgever met een prettige  sociale en informele werksfeer  INTERESSE  SOLLICITEER DIRECT

job_desc: As our Data Analyst  you are responsible for making Helloprint a more data driven company where data is used to drive action in every team  every day  Depending on the team you will join  you will improve daily decision making and build automations using data  work on  and execute our Pricing strategies  or are responsible for managing the product   carrier data of the European network behind our large and fast growing product portfolio  In every team  we have a big amount of data at our fingertips with over 1 000 product groups  10 million product combinations  200 global and local carrier options  300 production partners  and active business in 13 countries At Helloprint we are looking for a Junior Medior Data Analyst for 3 teams  Data Analytics team  You make business results measurable and know how to get the insights needed to take action  You help team members of other departments to specify their goals and translate them into KPIs and data requirements  By using your knowledge of SQL  Python  and R to perform analyses and act based on that data  You are a strategic thinker  but not afraid of picking up the trash yourself either  You are proactive in identifying opportunities  starting projects with business teams across Helloprint  You are able to clearly communicate complex  technical topics in a way that s understandable and shows clear suggestions for the next actions  Pricing team As Helloprint s Pricing Data Analyst  you are responsible for the commercial execution of our pricing strategies  Based on your research and analyses you are responsible for the optimization of our pricing models  This will be a very challenging job  our business is in 13 countries and we have over 10 million unique products that require pricing  You know all the in s and out s of the pricing business and you will make sure our product offering always has the most competitive pricing  You have the vision  where do we go with our pricing strategies  How can we improve our margins  Supply Data team  As a Data Analyst within the Supply Data team  you re responsible for managing the product   carrier data of the European network behind our large and fast growing product portfolio together with the team  With over 1 000 product groups  10 million product combinations  200 global and local carrier options  and 300 production partners  this is a huge amount of data  Retrieving  translating  and mapping data to our platform standard from any source or automation of data related processes using Python and or Alteryx is something you feel comfortable with based on your knowledge and skills  On top of taking you are given the responsibility to take the lead in certain projects from the get go given your experience  Does this make your eyes grow bigger  your hands start to itch  and do you feel the desire to make an impact and create fast growth  Look no more  This is the place for you  Are you ready for this  What we are looking for 1 2 years  Junior level  or 2 4 years  Medior level  of experience in data analytics  A Bachelor s Degree in Computer Science  Mathematics  Economics  Engineering  Operations Research  Statistics  Business or other related technical disciplines  Master s Degree is a plus   Excellent analytical skills  SQL   Python or R highly preferred   Advanced experience with Excel  For the role in the Data team  experience in website tracking  Google Analytics  Google Tag Manager  Segment  Snowplow or similar tools  and data orchestration tools  Airflow  dbt   Experience with Alteryx is a plus  Experience Purpose   Overall Relevance for the Organization  Data Governance enables adidas to leverage the value of data for our digital transformation  The team achieves that by defining the data governance and data quality frameworks  methods  and standards for business processes as well as IT systems  We design innovative data solutions along with new initiatives  consult projects and enforce data compliance together with our partners in Analytics  Business and Tech  We take advantage of automation  machine learning and democratization of data to allow data driven decision making even faster and more often and to unleash the real power of data right from the start  Key Responsibilities Data Management Assists in providing accessibility  retrievability  security and protection of dataData Visualization Support presentation of data in useful and appealing ways to target audience Business Analysis Investigates operational needs and problems  and opportunities  contributing to the recommendation of improvements in preferably automated components of new or changed processes and organization  Assists in defining acceptance tests for these recommendations  Assists with the creation of presentations for critical stakeholder engagements  Specialist Advice Contributes to summarize specialist advice to provide coherent guidance to further organizational objectives  Key Relationships  All business functions and marketsRequisite Education and Experience   Minimum Qualifications  College or university degree with focus on Business Administration or IT or related areas  or equivalent combination of education and experience Preferably 1 2 years of work experience in data governance or data affine business  IT functions  lateral entrants possible  Proficient spoken and written command of English Strong analytical thinking as well as communication skills AT ADIDAS WE HAVE A WINNING CULTURE  BUT TO WIN  PHYSICAL POWER IS NOT ENOUGH  JUST LIKE ATHLETES OUR EMPLOYEES NEED MENTAL STRENGTH IN THEIR GAME  WE FOSTER THE ATHLETE S MINDSET THROUGH A SET OF BEHAVIORS THAT WE WANT TO ENABLE AND DEVELOP IN OUR PEOPLE AND THAT ARE AT THE CORE OF OUR UNIQUE COMPANY CULTURE   THE 3CS  CONFIDENCE  COLLABORATION AND CREATIVITY  CONFIDENCE allows athletes to make quick decisions on the field  to reach higher  For us at adidas confidence means acknowledging that we don t have all the answers  But we are willing to take risks  we try new things  And if we fail  then this is part of our learning   it helps us improve  COLLABORATION  Every elite athlete relies on partners  coaches  teammates  and nutritionists  We  too  know that we are stronger together  Winning as one team takes open and candid dialogue  inclusiveness and trust in each other s abilities and talents  Being the best sports company in the world takes CREATIVITY  No great athlete succeeds by copying their predecessors  training plans and strategies  We have to be open to new ideas  explore  gain an edge and stand out  Only then can we succeed  ADIDAS CELEBRATES DIVERSITY  SUPPORTS INCLUSIVENESS AND ENCOURAGES INDIVIDUAL EXPRESSION IN OUR WORKPLACE  WE DO NOT TOLERATE THE HARASSMENT OR DISCRIMINATION TOWARD ANY OF OUR APPLICANTS OR EMPLOYEES  WE ARE AN EQUAL OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER   JOB TITLE  Data Governance Analyst BRAND  adidas LOCATION  Amsterdam TEAM  Data   Analytics STATE  NH we goed voor 33 miljoen artikelen en bestelpieken tot 700 items per minuut  Om te borgen dat we logistieke beloften kunnen blijven inlossen  dient de logistieke keten continu te worden uitgebreid en vernieuwd  Klinkt simpel  maar het aantal variabelen is huge   Wat je doet als Data Analist Capacity Management  Als Data Analist Capacity Management help je ons om de volledige logistieke keten te benutten  Een complex en dynamisch speelveld  waarbij jij mede aan de basis staat van de capaciteitsbeslissingen  Als onderdeel van het Capacity Management team zorgen jullie er samen voor dat de juiste inzichten duidelijk worden gecommuniceerd  Je verzorgt diepgaande analyses en zorgt dat logistieke kansen en knelpunten inzichtelijk worden  Te midden van de logistieke hectiek ben jij degene die met je analytische talent  programmeer skills en oplossingsgerichte houding inzichten verschaft   Concrete projecten waar je als Data Analist Capacity Management aan kunt meewerken  zijn het optuigen van een nieuw of verbeteren van bestaande forecast  het opzetten van een nieuw dashboard  of het automatiseren van bestaande modellen  Als Data Analist Capacity Management werk je niet puur  op bestelling   want eigen initiatief wordt aangemoedigd  Begrijp de processen waar je inzicht op geeft  Duik de data in  Kom tot hypotheses die je objectief bewijst of ontkracht  Vertaal de beste inzichten naar slimme verbeteringen en of innovaties waar data gedreven besluiten over genomen kunnen worden  En maak ze  samen met je collega s  werkelijkheid   Als Data Analist Capacity Management met grote hoeveelheden data als je hobby beschouwt Hier kom je terecht Bij hét online retail tech platform van Nederland en België  Een platform waar 11 5 miljoen Nederlandse en Belgische klanten sinds 1999  En dat blijven we doen  Als het beter kan  maken we het beter  Samen met klanten  partners en zo n 2 100 collega s  Als PMO Peakwarehouse land je in een  niet bestaand  fulfilment center en creatieve omgeving met leuke activiteiten  De extra s Denk hierbij aan trainingen  een lekkere lunch  een telefoon en eventueel een leaseauto  wanneer dit nodig is voor het uitoefenen van je een gesprek  Het eerste contact Wij nemen telefonisch contact met je op om het eerste gesprek in te plannen  En als we elkaar toch al spreken  pak vooral de kans om alvast prangende vragen te stellen  Elkaar in het echt  digitaal  ontmoeten Tijdens het eerste gesprek maken we kennis met elkaar  We zullen ingaan op jouw competenties en je eerdere werkervaring  En natuurlijk ook de inhoud van de Wederzijdse liefde Is er een wederzijdse match  Dan doen wij je graag een aanbod bestaande uit een passend salaris en onze arbeidsvoorwaarden  We doen nog een laatste dubbelcheck op het papierwerk in job_desc: At CarNext  we want to skip the hassle  Join our team and be part of a dynamic  exciting and engaging business  making the world simpler  better and hassle free together  Do you have an analytical mindset  Are you an expert with Tableau   Do you love to work within an fast paced environment  If you answered yes to these questions  please challenge yourself and apply now for the role of Data Analyst at CarNext  This is CarNext CarNext is a scale  up with a start up mentality  We re bold and have a passion to change the status quo  We re building a transparent digital marketplace that customers can trust  And it s the same at CarNext  We re proud of our open culture  collaborative ethos  vibrant environment and can do approach  As we grow our business  we re keen to hear from people who understand what we re about and can help us achieve our mission  What will you do  As a Data Analyst   Tableau Developer it is your chance to show off your Tableau skills and get creative informing key stakeholders at CarNext  You ll support daily business decisions by creating dashboards and insights from a sourcing perspective  This is a position which requires extensive experience with Tableau but also analytical skills  are looking for someone who works with precision  is decisive  has a great set of analytical skills and loves to get things in motion  You will work closely with the Marketing team  Your key responsibility is to provide the Marketing team with insights that improve the way the business is managed  Designing and developing Tableau dashboards will be a key element in this as well as doing business data analysis on request or on own initiative  Your key responsibilities   Translating Business needs into Business Insights   Doing business and data analysis that support the business   Preparing data for analysis  Developing reports using Tableau   Training users   Documentation of the learnings and methods applied   M aintaining the dashboards   Combining the Efficiency in Business Intelligence with Creativity in Business Analytics   Which skills and experience should you have for this position  4  years of experience as data analyst   3  years of experience with Tableau andSQL is a must   experience with launching tableau for the first time in an organization is a plus   Stakeholder management and good communication skills   AWS experience is good to have   Statistical knowledge and data modelling is required  Have experience with Programming Languages   Python  or R  is a plus  Grow with us CarNext provides ample opportunities for personal and professional growth  If this position interests you  go ahead  apply and send us your CV   Careers at CarNext CarNext operates across seven European countries  disrupting the used car market by offering an innovative platform  We want to deliver cars  hassle free  Innovative as we are  it is the people at CarNext that make it happen  We are a fast growing and dynamic company  offering our people a place to grow with us in creating the future

Overview   Job Description   We are looking for a Data Operations Analyst to join our expanding Operations Analysis team  With your strong analytical skills and an eye for detail  you will be responsible for collecting  documenting  and analysing internal and external sources of data  You will identify new analytics trends  opportunities to drive innovation and new data sources  next to the development of analytical models and insightful business reports and dashboards You will be based at our European headquarters in Amersfoort and will report to the Senior Operations Analyst  You will be working together with all operations related departments  such as Engineering  IT  Quality  Maintenance  and Manufacturing  Key Responsibilities Creating and automating KPIs  metrics and reports for all Operations related departments Develop and maintain reports in Power BI to provide new insights to drive business decisions Working closely with Software developers in the development and deployment of HANA views  SQL tables  setting up APIs and other dataflows by defining requirements and testing Initiating quality data improvements in the use of webapps  SAP and other software tools by identifying outliers in the data and analysing trends Conducting research and investigating existing business processes to identify bottlenecks and make them visible in data representation tools  like PowerBI  Excel  Visio and others  Communicating findings in an effective and efficient manner to customers and users  Develop and implement improvement proposals using data driven frameworks Advocate for use of data driven methodologies Participate in interdepartmental process improvements and projects as Subject Matter Expert for data analysis Requirements  Bachelor s degree  Operations research or Analytics  1 3 years of experience with data analysis Strong affinity with Operations Excellent reporting and analytical skills using Excel Knowledge of database software power BI is preferred Knowledge of ERP software  SAP is preferred Excellent oral and written communication skills in English Flexible and able to multi task Currently living in The Netherlands and entitled to work within the EU We Offer  A hybrid workplace  where you can work partially from home  except for operational vacancies  A diverse and international company culture  with over 35 different nationalities Opportunities for professional and personal development as we believe in continuous learning Onsite group exercise classes and health activities Community outreach and volunteer opportunities Reimbursement of relocation expenses Naturally  we offer a good remuneration package including pension and 27 vacations days At Applied Medical  we are committed to make a meaningful  positive difference  each and every day  Within our European headquarters in Amersfoort  NL   we develop  manufacture and support the implementation of our advanced medical devices across Europe and the MENA region  Applied s team members enjoy working in an environmentally friendly and international environment  in which people of diverse backgrounds are valued  challenged  and acknowledged  We support our team members by giving them opportunities of ongoing learning and education  possibilities to take part in community volunteering activities and a variety of onsite exercise classes and Introduction to the job Do you love designing  product  data solutions and playing a key role in the fundaments for Operational Excellence   Are you keen to work in a data driven environment within a high tech global enterprise  Are you challenged by working in such an environment and while doing so striving for the highest possible  data  quality and essentially making great business impact through that  If so  then this might be the right opportunity for you  Role and responsibilities ASML strives to become  best in class  in operational excellence  We as a department enable ASML to be in control of product master data  model  as the foundation for efficient business execution  at any point in time  As a Data Subject Matter Expert you are responsible for providing product data solutions that fit best with the requirements and ambitions from our business stakeholders  securing data quality trough adherence to the data framework  data governance and other data fundaments  You will contribute to product data improvements which are performed by multidisciplinary  project  teams that consist of multiple business stakeholders  within   outside Sourcing   Supply Chain  and IT   Key Areas of Responsibilities  providing product data solutions  solving structural product data issues within the business by applying problem solving skills and securing data quality  This includes  performing root cause analyses and defining product data improvement initiatives providing impact assessments  translating requirements into user stories  creating functional and technical specifications for the solution  incl  cleansing migration strategy when needed   creating   preparing product data quality reporting aligning with business stakeholders on required process changes  preparing and supporting end to end testing  contributing to the implementation of the data solution in the organization  e g  by preparing training creating   maintaining work instructions  procedures and product data quality solutions  2nd line support for operational issues   incidents  where other stakeholders from the data management community need help in root cause analysis and or issue resolution  responsible for continuously improving our way of working  applying performance management  problem solving methodology  and other tools that can support in continuous improvements  contributing to department s roadmapEducation and experience MS c degree in Information Technology  Industrial Engineering  or related fields 5  years relevant and proven experience Experience with  product  data quality management and its impact on business processes Experience with data architecture s  and understanding of data modeling  including knowledge on product data model Experience with performance management  metrics  KPI s and reporting  Experience with SAP  or ERP  applications  such as MM  MDG  BOIS BODS   ECM  is a pre Understanding how data governance is embedded within global enterprisesSkills Working at the cutting edge of tech  you ll always have new challenges and new problems to solve   and working together is the only way to do that  You won t work in a silo  Instead  you ll be part of a creative  dynamic work environment where you ll collaborate with supportive colleagues  There is always space for creative and unique points of view  You ll have the flexibility and trust to choose how best to tackle tasks and solve problems  To thrive in this job  you ll need the following skills  Pro active attitude  drive for improvement Ability to structure and conduct analyses to generate insight and recommendations Excellent problem solving skills Well developed project management skills  focus on stakeholder management and influencing without power  Experience with Lean and Agile are a pre Result driven Drive and motivation to ensure successful delivery of complex initiatives Ability to leverage resources available to achieve goals Excellent professional communication in EnglishDiversity   Inclusion ASML is an Equal Opportunity Employer that values and respects the importance of a diverse and inclusive workforce  It is the policy of the company to recruit  hire  train and promote persons in all job titles without regard to race  color  religion  sex  age  national origin  veteran status  disability  sexual orientation  or gender identity  We recognize that diversity and inclusion is a driving force in the success of our company  Other information The Data Quality Expert role is part of the Data Quality Solutions team and part of the Master Data Management department  The department manages global product related data  enabling ASML to achieve high data quality leading to operational excellence by supporting time to profitability  It manages data governance boards for ASML s manufacturing  supply chain management  finance and procurement departments   The Master Data Management organization is an industry leading organization  responsible for ensuring material availability to ASML s factories and customers  Our DNA contains customer focus  concurrent engineering  virtual integration plus the ability to thrive in a volatile market  accelerate the supply chain and deliver creative solutions  Plans are made up to four years ahead while customer requirements and system bill of materials can change at any time  Any break in material availability can have an unacceptable impact for our customers  So  with all our highly talented  educated and motivated people  we must proactively identify and solve potential issues by working closely together with our technical departments and customers while actively managing an extensive supplier base  Check for more information our website www asml com Need to know more about applying for a job at ASML  Read our frequently asked questions

Amsterdam  Netherlands   Growth   Full time  We re looking for a data analyst to join our agile EU Growth squad  Our ideal candidate is adept at modeling complex data  uncovering patterns  and delivering data driven insights   In this role  you ll help provide the analytical firepower to help evolve our acquisition strategy and effective  efficient expansion to new EU markets  You ll collaborate with other data analysts and leverage the many internal tools we have developed to continuously measure  test  and optimize across all partners and platforms   If you love to take initiative and are a natural self starter who never backs down from a challenge this one s for you   Requirements 2  years of experience in a data analytics role  preferably within a fast growing consumer company Bachelor s degree in Mathematics  Statistics  Computer Science  or a related field Proficiency in SQL is essential  knowledge of statistical modeling is preferred Familiarity with digital marketing platforms is strongly preferred Hands on experience with modern data analytics stack  e g  Snowflake  dbt  Looker  and common MarTech tools  e g  Google Tag Manager  Google Analytics  Appsflyer  is a plus About Lemonade Lemonade is a licensed insurance carrier offering renters  homeowners  car  pet  and life insurance insurance in the United States  contents and liability insurance in Germany and the Netherlands  and renters insurance in France  We re powered by artificial intelligence and behavioral economics  and driven by social good  A Certified B Corp  Lemonade donates unused premiums to nonprofits selected by its community as part of our annual Giveback program  We incorporate our values into everything we do from our business model to our office culture

The job of a Junior FP A Analyst  Working within the Financial Planning   Analysis team  FP A   you will provide the Business with key financial analysis for decision making  Under the direct supervision of a Commercial Analyst  you will support the FP A Team  Business Leaders and Departments with the information to evaluate operational performance and opportunities within the designated function s    Your role is key in processing  analyzing  and interpreting the data that we collect from our channel partners distributor network  Our partners are sharing Point Of Sales  POS  and Inventory data  which enables our business to make informed strategic decisions  you provide ad hoc analyses and support to the business  you proactively challenge results and seek opportunities to improve sales out   You produce custom made reports and dashboards by making use of BI tools and Excel  you will develop and demonstrate a strong business understanding  which is reflected in the reports  analysis  and commentaries provided  and assist the FP A Manager in managing the overall business highlighting opportunities for improvement  Additional responsibilities that come with this role   Continuously improve efficiency  quality and speed of cleaning  consolidating and reporting the data that we receive from our distributor network Follow up on performance and prepare daily weekly updates   Monitor KPIs in coordination with the business leaders   About the team  The FP A team is an international and diverse group of nine team players  All colleagues have their own specialties and focus areas but there is a lot of interaction and support to each other  We are dynamic and innovative  used to working with deadlines  but also find the time to have fun  Experience  Experience in cleaning and combining multiple data sources   Ability to meet tight deadlines  handle a demanding and fluctuating workload and at the same time provide accurate and reliable data   High level Excel skills  experience with Oracle and Hyperion would be a plus  Experience with Power Query  Power BI  and DAX is also considered to be a pre   A Bachelor s degree in Data Analytics and or Finance related studies or an equivalent of 1 3 years of experience as an analyst in an international  corporate  environment   Fluency in English  mastery of other  European  languages would be a plus   Personal skills  Thoroughness and attention to detail with steadiness under pressure  You are a team player who shows energy and persistence   Strong communication skills and the ability to combine your understanding of the financial process with persuasiveness and confidence   Development opportunities  We offer an environment in which you can  further  develop your skills in the area of Data Analytics and or Financial Planning  You can think of the following tasks that will help you gain knowledge and experience   Support with developing  testing  updating  and improving BI reports and dashboards  Support and drive the Business Teams in the preparation of the Annual Budget and Monthly Forecast  Analyze monthly results versus Monthly Forecast and Budget  find opportunities to improve Forecast Accuracy  Work together with the Commercial Analyst to prepare monthly forecast updates  analyze the impact of price adjustments  prepare margin analyses  Assist with testing  updating and improving BI reports and dashboards   Future prospects will become available for those that show drive  determination and ultimately achieve results  To make the application process easier  please skip filling in the fields and simply upload your resume as a PDF using your first and last name as the file name  Example  firstname lastname pdf  Fortive is a diversified industrial growth company comprised of global businesses that are recognized leaders in attractive markets  With more than  6 billion in annual revenues  Fortive s well known brands hold leading positions in field instrumentation  transportation  sensing  product realization  automation and specialty  and franchise distribution   Fortive is headquartered in Everett  Washington and employs a team of more than 24 000 research and development  manufacturing  sales  distribution  service and administrative employees in more than 40 countries around the world  Our team grows by tackling challenges that accelerate progress and further their careers  With a culture rooted in continuous improvement  the core of our company s operating model is the Fortive Business System  For more information please visit  www fortive com    Fluke Corporation is the world leader in the manufacture  distribution and service of electronic test tools and software  We are a dynamic market leader with sound financial health  Fluke has achieved the number one or number two position in every market in which it competes  The Fluke brand has a reputation for portability  ruggedness  safety  ease of use and rigid standards of quality  A wholly owned subsidiary of Fortive Corporation   www fortive com    Fluke is a multi national corporation headquartered in the greater Seattle area  We offer an entrepreneurial environment that is team centered  customer driven  quality focused  and growth oriented  It is driven by the phenomenally successful Fortive Business System  Working at Fluke gives you access to a robust career development process and challenging   stretch  opportunities

job_desc: About iptiQiptiQ is a risk tech start up within Swiss Re Group  one of the world s leading providers of reinsurance and insurance  iptiQ is transforming the way consumers buy insurance with a unique digital insurance engine  which incorporates the latest technology  We are strengthening our data analytics capabilities  and looking for a marketing and customer focused data analyst to join our Product Intelligence team  iptiQ offers a flexible working environment  where curious and innovative people thrive  Are you interested in joining us   About the Role We are looking for a data analyst with a flair for engineering to help shape our digital solutions across EMEA and change the way insurance is bought online  No more insurance talk that only a lawyer understands  we are here to make a difference  As a Data Analyst  you will work in a multi functional environment to design  enhance and operate our analytics products  Your responsibilities Enable a data informed culture within iptiQ Lead and grow product analytics and customer behaviour understanding capabilities Partner with key stakeholders in Product  Marketing  UX and Technology to optimise strategy   tactics based on data Based on business requirements develop analytics products What we look for Advanced knowledge of Python and SQL Hands on knowledge of BI and reporting tools  DataStudio  Tableau  Basic knowledge of web technologies  e g   JavaScript  HTML5  Experience with Airflow and dbt Passion for data and storytelling with data Interest in working in a multi locational team within Europe Avid learner who stays up to date with the latest trends and can vet with pragmatism and long term vision the adoption of new technologies Master s or PhD degree in a data focused field or equivalent working experience Ability to speak and write English fluently Interest in learning about B2B2C digital insurance products About the team We re a start up embedded within an organisation known for its high caliber talent and excellent benefits  So you get the best of both worlds   a fast paced  exciting environment with a genuine work life balance and more  Do you enjoy pushing borders and have a passion for the latest technologies  Go ahead and apply today  We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company  We do not discriminate on the basis of race  religion  color  national origin  gender  sexual orientation  age  marital status  veteran status  or disability status  We provide feedback to all candidates via email  If you have not heard back from us  please check your spam folder

This is Adyen  Adyen is the payments platform of choice for the world s leading companies  delivering frictionless payments across online  mobile  and in store channels  Our team members are motivated individuals that help each other do remarkable things every day  We face unique technical challenges at scale and we solve those as a team  And together  we deliver innovative and ethical solutions that transform the way the world pays  We took an unobvious approach to starting a payments company  building a platform from scratch  Now  Adyen serves the world s brightest companies like Facebook  Uber  L Oreal  Casper  Bonobos  and Spotify   VP Product   Data  Adyen is looking for a passionate Product VP to massively scale our ability to convert data into value for our customers  Your teams will build and scale our core data generated by the massive volume from our financial services  Our merchants are the fastest growing companies in the world  and we need to stay ahead of their needs as their guide to manage highly regulated  highly sensitive data in a changing world  Your vision will enable every team at Adyen to run experiments  use data to solve problems worth millions  and ensure analytics are accessible and familiar to every Adyener from their first day  This role will be given considerable freedom to develop Adyen s data capabilities  including AI  core data infrastructure  data extraction  and rapid prototyping of datasets  You will create and evangelize a vision for products powered by Adyen s Big Data platform  realize that vision with multiple teams of product managers  designers  data scientists  and engineers  and ensure Adyen merchants gain measurable benefit from your teams  efforts  In this role you will  Listen to our merchants  engineers  and partners to find problems that Adyen is uniquely positioned to solve Become a known thought leader in the industry for financial technology and the use of data Long term strategic vision behind Data engineering Build vs  buy decisions  Open source scouting  External service big data   tooling providers Internal data enablement  Data engineering and architecture  Complexity vs  WIN  application of ML vs  next viable option  ML Scaling and tooling for cross company adoption What you need to succeed  Leadership   you have directly managed teams and you also have significant experience in scaling a data organization in a large  global company as management lead  Integrity   you have earned the trust of your technical and non technical customers and colleagues  from the board level to support level Proven record   you have conceived of launched and scaled multiple products in the big data   machine learning space with quantifiable value Data informed   you can guide data science engineering teams with the right questions to answer  and turn those answers into business value Business acumen   you have identified novel and significant revenue opportunities  and have convinced senior executives to invest in your product strategy Adaptability and creativity   plans and conditions always change  but you still positively navigate the right course Poise   sales asks you to sit with their clients  and marketing asks you to present at conferences  Network   you leverage your own network to hire  influence  validate  and get product adoption   Our Diversity  Equity   Inclusion Commitments  Our unobvious approach is a product of our diverse perspectives  This diversity of backgrounds  cultures  and perspectives is essential in helping us maintain our momentum  Our business and technical challenges are unique  we need as many different voices as possible to join us in solving them   voices like yours  So no matter where you re from  who you love  or what you believe in  we welcome you to be your true self at Adyen   Studies show that women and members of underrepresented communities apply for jobs only if they meet 100  of the qualifications  Do you recognize yourself in this statement  If so  Adyen encourages you to reconsider and apply  We look forward to your application   What is next   Ensuring a smooth and enjoyable candidate experience is critical for us  We aim to get back to you regarding your application within 7 business days  Our interview process tends to take between 3 or 4 weeks to complete  Don t be afraid to let us know if you need more flexibility

Word jij enthousiast van data en vind jij het leuk om teamleden te verbluffen met jouw technisch inzicht  Dan is deze functie echt iets voor jou   Wat is je doel   Als dataspecialist Purpose   Overall Relevance for the Organization  Data Governance enables adidas to leverage the value of data for our digital transformation  The team achieves that by defining the data governance and data quality frameworks  methods  and standards for business processes as well as IT systems  We design innovative data solutions along with new initiatives  consult projects and enforce data compliance together with our partners in Analytics  Business and Tech  We take advantage of automation  machine learning and democratization of data to allow data driven decision making even faster and more often and to unleash the real power of data right from the start  Key Responsibilities Data Management Assists in providing accessibility  retrievability  security and protection of dataData Visualization Support presentation of data in useful and appealing ways to target audience Business Analysis Investigates operational needs and problems  and opportunities  contributing to the recommendation of improvements in preferably automated components of new or changed processes and organization  Assists in defining acceptance tests for these recommendations  Assists with the creation of presentations for critical stakeholder engagements  Specialist Advice Contributes to summarize specialist advice to provide coherent guidance to further organizational objectives  Key Relationships  All business functions and marketsRequisite Education and Experience   Minimum Qualifications  College or university degree with focus on Business Administration or IT or related areas  or equivalent combination of education and experience Preferably 1 2 years of work experience in data governance or data affine business  IT functions  lateral entrants possible  Proficient spoken and written command of English Strong analytical thinking as well as communication skills AT ADIDAS WE HAVE A WINNING CULTURE  BUT TO WIN  PHYSICAL POWER IS NOT ENOUGH  JUST LIKE ATHLETES OUR EMPLOYEES NEED MENTAL STRENGTH IN THEIR GAME  WE FOSTER THE ATHLETE S MINDSET THROUGH A SET OF BEHAVIORS THAT WE WANT TO ENABLE AND DEVELOP IN OUR PEOPLE AND THAT ARE AT THE CORE OF OUR UNIQUE COMPANY CULTURE   THE 3CS  CONFIDENCE  COLLABORATION AND CREATIVITY  CONFIDENCE allows athletes to make quick decisions on the field  to reach higher  For us at adidas confidence means acknowledging that we don t have all the answers  But we are willing to take risks  we try new things  And if we fail  then this is part of our learning   it helps us improve  COLLABORATION  Every elite athlete relies on partners  coaches  teammates  and nutritionists  We  too  know that we are stronger together  Winning as one team takes open and candid dialogue  inclusiveness and trust in each other s abilities and talents  Being the best sports company in the world takes CREATIVITY  No great athlete succeeds by copying their predecessors  training plans and strategies  We have to be open to new ideas  explore  gain an edge and stand out  Only then can we succeed  ADIDAS CELEBRATES DIVERSITY  SUPPORTS INCLUSIVENESS AND ENCOURAGES INDIVIDUAL EXPRESSION IN OUR WORKPLACE  WE DO NOT TOLERATE THE HARASSMENT OR DISCRIMINATION TOWARD ANY OF OUR APPLICANTS OR EMPLOYEES  WE ARE AN EQUAL OPPORTUNITY EMPLOYER   JOB TITLE  Data Governance Analyst BRAND  adidas LOCATION  Amsterdam TEAM  Data   Analytics STATE  NH responsibility by collaborating with a highly specialized and skilled set of colleagues from the Farm  Milk   Sustainability team  but also Digital R D  ICT and external parties  In this specific role as a Digital Analyst  you will focus on enabling data driven decision making in the area of sustainability  As a sustainability data analyst you  Engage with business stakeholders to understand their sustainability challenges and translate them into digital needs Define  develop  embed and maintain sustainable digital solutions  with DevOps team  Stay up to date on the evolving landscape of tools and technologies  invest in learning some of the relevant tools  especially related to processing large amounts of data   and proactively experiment with them to stay at the cutting edge Build a network of experts  inside and outside FC  to consult on tools and techniques Provide input into overall sustainability strategy and plans  and contribute to digital sustainability capability building  What we ask Academic degree in computer science  information technology or in a relevant business domain  e g   Environmental science Background in sustainability a plus  interest in sustainability a must Experienced in developing dashboards to deliver insights using dashboarding tools  e g  PowerBI  Experience with SQL and Non SQL databases  especially Graph Databases is a plus   data driven analyses using python R Knowledge on methodologies such as Life Cycle Assessment  LCA  on  parts of  the dairy chain is a plus A continuous improvement  and equally importantly a continuous learning mindset   as the tool landscape in Digital evolves considerably with time Ability to challenge status quo and create enthusiasm for change Good communication  listening  and presentation skillsWhat we offer Opportunity to step into the important world of sustainability Opportunity to work throughout the chain and ability to create real impact Exposure to a wide diversity of business and farm challenges in RFC Competitive salary and benefits A highly skilled  ambitious and fun team  who values change and sees opportunities Hybrid and flexible way of working Learning and growth Join Avanade s Data Analytics Techionista Academy   Avanade proudly launches the Data Analytics Academy  in collaboration with Avanade and Techionista  offering you the unique opportunity to grow your capabilities  Whether or not you have relevant experience  this Academy is designed to give you the skills and certifications so you can take your career to new heights in the field of data and artificial intelligence   The Data Analytics Techionista Academy is      The 100  online Academy will introduce you to the world of data and analytics  Sessions will take place in English and combines theoretical modules with practical work modules  Avanade offers you a unique opportunity to kickstart your career in Tech   The technical components of the Techionista Academy comprise of the following Microsoft Certifications  Azure Fundamentals AZ 900  Data Analyst DA 100 and Azure Data Engineer DP 203  The duration of the academy is 16 weeks starting in May 2022  We are looking for smart and motivated individuals who are eager to learn and who isn t afraid of change  Do you find the world of Data Analytics fascinating  Are you ready for a new career  This is your chance   Why Avanade   Distinctive experiences  Limitless learning  Ambitious growth  That s what you get when you choose to join and build your career at Avanade  Our commitment to innovation means there is always something new to learn and explore  And our commitment to our people means that you will have lots of opportunities to grow your knowledge and skill through formal training and on the job learning  This program is ideal if you have An interest in data and analytics  A desire to train on the Microsoft Azure Cloud and or if you already hold a Microsoft certification  Exposure to any data related tools such Tableau  Excel VBA  SQL etc The desire to challenge yourself to join a consulting business  You have a very good level of written and spoken Dutch   English   What will be your role in our Avanade Data Analytics team after the academy   Within our data analytics team we have multiple roles  As you progress through the academy we will help you identify which roles you would like to be aligned with  Below is a brief overview of two of our roles  Data Engineer  Do you love making sure that information is available and consumable  So do we   As a Data Engineer Consultant  you know the importance of data to the business  You design and set up projects that bring together information from various sources to enable analysis and decision making  You make sure that data is accessible and easy to use for routine and ad hoc analysis  Day to day  you will be Finding trends in data sets and developing algorithms to help make raw data more useful to the enterprise  Collecting the data from various sources  transforming it into desire formats  and storing it into data stores like Data Lake  Azure Synapse Analytics  Implementing complex  large scale big data projects focusing on collecting  managing  analyzing  and visualizing large datasets  Taking part in designing and running bespoke data services for individual projects  Staying up to date with leading edge processes in using  retrieving data  building machine learning models  Crafting and use effective metrics and monitoring processes  Support deal teams by providing subject knowledge and solutions for client proposals   Power BI Consultant  Do you love telling stories with data using modern visualisation techniques  So do we   The role of a Power BI consultant is a mixture of consulting skills alongside technical data modelling and visualisation skills   Our projects are varied and may be anything from creating a short proof of value to a large reporting suite as part of a modern data platform solution in Azure   As part of a large global community of Power BI consultants within Avanade  there is extensive training  support and guidance to help to develop your Power Platform skills to the next level  Responsibilities Include Ingesting data from a variety of data sources and performing required transformations using Power Query and Data Flows  Data modelling capabilities including designing effective BI data models in line with the Kimball methodology and best practice  Publishing reports via the Power BI service  managing them through distribution of apps and monitoring usage data refreshes security access  N  for large scale deployments this is often undertaken by our managed services team   Working closely with clients  gathering requirements and translating them  Shaping an approach for governance and deployment of Power BI in large organisations  including advising on licensing  distribution sharing  training  support and best practices   Why would you choose Avanade  You will become part of an active and growing data analytics community  Your future colleagues will help you with questions and challenges  Moreover  there is a pleasant  informal working atmosphere  Knowledge development is our focus  and we ensure this both by offering formal training opportunities as well as informal evenings where peers share their knowledge  With your passion  you can use the latest Microsoft technology to make a daily difference for our customers in the Enterprise market  We have a strong focus on the career and development opportunities of all our people  Everyone has a career advisor who will work with you to create a plan and guide you in choosing from the many training opportunities we offer
